scripts.flatten: truffle-flattener contracts/BnbStaking.sol > flatten-contracts/BnbStaking.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/LotteryRewardPool.sol > flatten-contracts/LotteryRewardPool.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/MasterChef.sol > flatten-contracts/MasterChef.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SaladToken.sol > flatten-contracts/SaladToken.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SauceBar.sol > flatten-contracts/SauceBar.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SmartChef.sol > flatten-contracts/SmartChef.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SousChef.sol > flatten-contracts/SousChef.sol
